geometry module¶

This modul contains functions, which are usefull to handle countours and points in order to get the geometry pattern.

geometry.rect_center(tl, tr, br, bl)[source]¶

” Computes centerpoint of a rectangle given it’s corners

Parameters

  • tl (InputArray) – Point in the top left

  • tr (InputArray) – Point in the top right

  • br (InputArray) – Point in the bottom right

  • bl (InputArray) – Point in the bottom left

Returns

Centerpoint

Return type

Output Array

geometry.remap_contours(cnts, map_x, map_y)[source]¶

Remaps the contours points

Parameters

  • cnts (InputArray) – Contours

  • map_x (InputArray) – Undistortion map in x

  • map_y (InputArray) – Undistortion map in y

Returns

Remaped Contours

Return type

OutputArray

Removes contours outside the definded to areas

  • minArea –

  • maxArea –

Output Contours
